name: ccmp
description: Integrated plugins for Claude Code that work together seamlessly. Features context management, session workflows, and TDD with automatic pattern discovery. Install all three for exponential value.

plugins.name: claude-context-manager
plugins.description: Autonomous context management through claude.md files. Auto-loads in sessions, monitors health in real-time, updates on checkpoints. Works standalone or integrated with session-management for exponential value.

plugins.name: session-management
plugins.description: Git-native session lifecycle with automatic context loading, TDD integration, and comprehensive handoffs. Orchestrates claude-context-manager and tdd-workflow. The integration hub.

plugins.name: tdd-workflow
plugins.description: Test-Driven Development with automatic pattern discovery and test context documentation. GREEN checkpoints auto-document patterns, violations detected, discipline scored. Integrates with sessions for full TDD tracking.

plugins.name: project-status-report
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive project health and status reports for rapid developer onboarding
